definition: achievement/accomplishment/(in more recent usage) performance (of a business, employee etc)/results
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: We believe that the sea is the production of "Tamiflu" short-term performance thickening.
sentences.chinese: 我们认为，海正生产“达菲”短期增厚业绩。

sentences.english: Managers may disown their part in the appraisal system.
sentences.chinese: 管理者也许会否认在业绩排名系统里面的角色。

sentences.english: The false performance record drove up the stocks of WorldCom and won it great acclaims from the stock market.
sentences.chinese: 虚假的业绩使世通的股票上涨，股市一片赞誉。

sentences.english: The fact is that China has good performance and high potential in attracting FDI.
sentences.chinese: 中国在吸收外资方面，不仅业绩显著，而且具有潜力。

sentences.english: The travel operation fared better than the company as a whole.
sentences.chinese: 该公司的旅游业务比公司整体业绩好一些。

sentences.english: Smith's new store opened last week and it's going great guns.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯上周新开的店业绩扶摇直上。

sentences.english: The American second-quarter results season was undoubtedly better than expected.
sentences.chinese: 美国第二业绩季度无疑好于预期。

sentences.english: The scandal he was involved in before detracts his from great glorious.
sentences.chinese: 他以往卷入的那件丑问已使他的光辉业绩大为失色。

sentences.english: Premier Zhou's illustrious deeds are an everlasting monument in the hearts of the Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 周总理的光辉业绩在中国人民心中立下了不朽的丰碑。

sentences.english: However, the performance of these workgroups is sometimes disappointing.
sentences.chinese: 然而，这些工作团队的业绩有时却令人失望。

sentences.english: Employing a consistent organization-wide approach to continual improvement of the organizations performance.
sentences.chinese: 在全组织使用一致的方法来持续地改进组织的业绩。

sentences.english: Looking at the world through the lense of Google's earnings is encouraging.
sentences.chinese: 透过谷歌业绩这块“透镜”看世界是令人鼓舞的。

sentences.english: P. Morgan's big win came in fixed-income markets.
sentences.chinese: 摩根大通当季业绩最大亮点来自于固定收益市场。

sentences.english: Giving priority to one whose group has out-standing reference and one who possesses working experience in the fitness trade.
sentences.chinese: 团队经营业绩突出，有健身行业工作经验优先考虑。

sentences.english: Analysts also predict improvements at Morgan Stanley /quotes/comstock/13*!
sentences.chinese: 分析家还预测，摩根士丹利将有业绩改善。

sentences.english: Usually only bonuses and long-term incentive plans are tied to results.
sentences.chinese: 通常情况下，只有奖金和长期激励才和业绩挂钩。

definition: to make good a deficit/to reverse a loss
to double/to increase by a certain number of times
